snippet.description: Identity is harder than you'd think and critical to securing your app. Let the experts at Ping Identity help. Give the free trial a go: http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf

snippet.title: Visualizing the OAuth Flow and Why PKCE is Needed
snippet.description: Here's a short scenario to help visualize the attack that sparked the need for PKCE. Gain a deeper understanding of why PKCE is needed by watching this video. Give the free trial a go: http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf

snippet.title: Learn About the PingOne for Customers Developer Community
snippet.description:
Grab a free trial to test out PingOne for Customers and participate in the community!  http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf
Anthony and Zach take you on a quick tour of the PingOne for Customers Developer Community and some other resources to get you on your way to getting Identity services in your customer facing application.

snippet.title: Don't Make Things Harder By Wearing Too Many Hats, PingOne for Customers Can Handle It
snippet.description:
Try out our free trial! http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf

See what it's like to be a developer wearing too many hats trying to implement identity and security into their app themselves, and what it's like to be a developer using PingOne for Customers.

snippet.title: Meet Your App Launch Deadlines While Also Making It Secure
snippet.description:
Short video of the downfalls of taking the DIY approach to implementing Identity Services yourself. Speed up your time to launch with PingOne for Customers which includes the ability to make API calls to get all the Identity Services you need.
Try out a free trial! http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf

snippet.title: Dynamic Authentication Policy with MFA Triggered on a Specified Attribute Value
snippet.description: Anthony Dombrowski walks through a quick demo of how to set up an authentication policy with MFA triggered only when an attribute value is found on the user. To see why this dynamic policy is so useful, an analogy of “grabbing a chip from a bag at the office” is shown. Try it out for yourself!  http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf

snippet.title: OAuth 2.0 Flow: How to Securely Get your Grapes
snippet.description: Watch this video to help you visualize the OAuth2.0 flow by using common objects, instead of complicated lines diagrams, tokens and codes. Want to see the OAuth 2.0 flow described in writing? Take a look at Anthony's blog: http://ow.ly/EOqk50xMXMA

snippet.title: OpenID Connect - Continuing the OAuth 2.0 Fruit Analogy
snippet.description:
Watch this video to visualize how and where OpenID Connect fits in with OAuth 2.0 and why it’s needed using common objects and an easy to digest narrative.

Launch your applications sooner, and let PingOne for Customers handle user identities for you. Try PingOne for Customers today: http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf

snippet.title: PingOne for Customers Postman Collection
snippet.description:
Take a look at how the PingOne for Customers Postman collection is organized, so you can rapidly iterate, test, debug, and integrate identity services with your app.

Postman collections are great and easy way to organize and increase your efficiency in API driven development. If you’re integrating identity services (MFA, Login, Registration) into your app with PingOne for Customers, we provide a sample collection to get you started. Try our sample Postman collection that includes all PingOne for Customers Authentication and Management API endpoints.  http://ow.ly/idBI30oBCWD

snippet.title: Use Postman Environments to Speed Up and Make API Development Easier
snippet.description:
Postman Environments help you keep track of variables, so you don’t have to stress over them. The PingOne for Customers postman collection comes with some variables baked in that you can use to get up to speed even faster with identity services when combined with a postman environment. 

Check out our Postman Collection!
https://apidocs.pingidentity.com/pingone/platform/v1/api/#postman-collection

snippet.title: The Great Developer Race
snippet.description:
Two Developers. One ticking clock. A race to be the first one to set up their PingOne for Customers sample app and authenticate. Can you beat our times? Try it out yourself with a free trial at http://ow.ly/vz8t50xMXAf

We're constantly updating and improving to bring you the best CIAM platform. Your experience may look a little different than what was recorded.

snippet.title: One Remote for all of your CIAM Solutions
snippet.description: Having too many admin consoles is like having too many remotes in your house. It's easy to forget or get confused by which remote goes to which system. Simplify your IAM administration with a single remote. Try it out! http://ow.ly/zLMB50EBakK
